Uses of Class
BuildingCentreReceipt.BuildingCentreProductBase

    • Uses of BuildingCentreProductBase in BuildingCentreReceipt

      Subclasses of BuildingCentreProductBase in BuildingCentreReceipt 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CraftsmanSupport
      The service of hiring a craftman to help with building as a product in the building centre.
      Craftmen can be hired on an houerly basis with a certain hourly rate.
      class  Material
      A certian quantity of building material which can be purchased in the building centre as a product.
      For all material, a maximum amount of 250 can be delivered.
      class  Tool
      A number of tools as physical objects which can be purchased as products in the building centre.
      This class represents one or more items of a specific tool.

      private static java.lang.String Main.receiptText​(java.util.List<BuildingCentreProductBase> shoppingCart)
      Create the receipt text for a specified shoppingcart.
      The text includes a heading all items in the shopping cart including name of the item price of the item pick up location or an info message if the pickup location is unknown the total price of the shopping cart a footer (thank you message)
